attributes.action: initiate a full investigation of MPs' expenses claims over the last five years using the Fraud Act 2001.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The terms of reference of this investigation should be based on the Fraud Act 2006 especially Section 2 (Fraud by false representation) and Section 4 (Fraud by abuse of position) carried out by independent auditors. 

If necessary, a rigorous police investigation should follow with appropriate legal action leading to appropriate sentencing as outlined in the Fraud Act 2006.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
